attributes.action: Want the parliament to  put forward a vote of no confidence in the government.
attributes.additional_details: Restore freedom and rights of the citizens who are sovereign in this land. Many policies pertaining to covid-19 has affected the citizens in many disastrous ways causing the downfall of the economy and unnecessary loss of lives.Many citizens fear for their lives and the lives of their families and the Government is not fit to protect its citizens as required by the country's constitution.
attributes.background: Many citizens are aggrieved by the Government's handling of covid-19 crisis and of policies implemented to take away the freedom of the citizens in direct opposition to article 61 of Magna Carta.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
